content.p: The School of Politics and International Relations offers interdisciplinary degrees across the areas of politics, international relations, security studies, political economy, political philosophy, and data science. We offer a range of module choices within each degree programme, so you can specialise as you progress through your course. Bao Nguyen, BA Politics and International Relations Ismat Papa Nii Yebuah, MA International Security and Terrorism Careers FAQs Disability information Law and Social Sciences building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
